title: Update splash screen company name font and add color styling

requirements.text: Update the splash screen company name styling in `frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx` to use a different, more stylized display font (different from the default sans) for the text "STAR MAHARASHTRA GALAXY INTERNET".

quotes: font change kar aur colour add kar name mai

acceptanceCriteria: On the splash screen, the company name text renders with a clearly different font style than the current default (e.g., a display/branding font feel).
The company name text remains exactly: "STAR MAHARASHTRA GALAXY INTERNET" (spelling/case/wording unchanged).
The splash screen continues to auto-transition, fade out, and allow skipping as before.

requirements.text: Add color styling to the splash screen company name text so it is no longer a single flat color (e.g., multi-color per word or a gradient effect), while keeping the tagline text unchanged.

quotes: font change kar aur colour add kar name mai

acceptanceCriteria: The company name text displays visible color styling (multi-color or gradient) across the words, and the result is clearly noticeable.
The tagline remains exactly: "Connect to the Future with Internet at Light Speed." and remains readable against the background.
In reduced-motion mode (`prefers-reduced-motion: reduce`), the new font and color styling still apply, and animations remain disabled as currently implemented.

constraints: Do not make any backend changes for this request.

Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep all user-facing text in English (no new non-English UI copy).
nonGoals: Changing the splash screen timing/transition behavior beyond preserving existing behavior.
Changing the tagline text or overall app theme outside the splash company name styling.
Adding or reintroducing a logo image on the splash screen.
